channel.title: How to make a list of commands on server?
channel.description:
im coding me server now :) already have some commands for staff (only ::food for ppl cuse its satan's isle). Staff have phat commands etc... but now is me question:
how do i make a command like ::help
its says someting like this
welcome to ScaredScape! i hope u enjoy ur time on the server
here are some commands: ... ... ... ... ...
and some more stuff, how could i do that?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 20, 2007, 11:09:02 AM[/size][hr]i still need help :mad: :( pleease help me! :|
